name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Covid-19 Report Stats for UK

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check the latest covid data of UK

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple extension that show the statistics of UK Covid-19 report, it is simply easy to check latest report of corona virus stats using this extension.
